item.description:
Join us for the annual pot luck lunch. This has always been a favorite and it gets better each year!!

The fun begins at 12 Noon. When you say YES you will attend, in the note please indicate which of the following you will bring

Food (Qty 4+) - i.e. Tuna, Roast Beef, Ham Sandwiches, etc

Snacks - i.e. Chips -

Drinks - i.e. juice and soda

Dessert - i.e. cookies brownies

Note: I (Doug) will bring paper products

See you there !
item.how_to_find_us: Note Auburndale is a village of Newton. It is approx 1/2 mile from the Newton Marriot (Intersection of Rt 128 and Mass Pike) See attached Map (click on it) or use Mapquest. Look for the orange cones...
item.name: Greater Boston Scooter Club Annual Pot Luck Picnic! ! !
